/* common.selectMenu */ SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T3.MENU_ID ,T3.UP_MENU_ID ,T3.MENU_NM ,T3.MENU_DEPTH ,T3.ORDER_SEQ ,T3.URL FROM SAD_ROLE_ASSIGN T1 ,SAD_MENU_ASSIGN T2 ,SAD_MENU T3 ,SAD_ROLE T4 WHERE T1.ROLE_ID = T2.ROLE_ID AND T2.MENU_ID = T3.MENU_ID AND T4.ROLE_ID = T1.ROLE_ID AND T4.ACTIVE_YN = 'Y' AND T1.ADMIN_ID = #admin_id# AND T3.MENU_DEPTH = #menu_depth# AND T3.ACTIVE_YN = 'Y' AND T3.MENU_YN = 'Y'
AND T3.MENU_ID = #menu_id#
AND T3.UP_MENU_ID = #up_menu_id#
ORDER BY T3.ORDER_SEQ )
WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 0 AND #limit#

/* common.selectCodeList */ SELECT MAJOR_CD ,MINOR_CD ,CD_NM ,USE_YN ,ORDER_SEQ ,REF1 ,REF2 ,REF3 ,REG_ID
,MOD_ID
,(SELECT CD_GRP_NM FROM SET_CD_GRP S1 WHERE S1.MAJOR_CD = T1.MAJOR_CD) MAJOR_NM FROM SET_CODE T1 WHERE MAJOR_CD = #major_cd# AND USE_YN = 'Y'
AND MINOR_CD = #minor_cd#
AND REF1 LIKE CONCAT(#ref1_like#, '%')
ORDER BY ORDER_SEQ

/* common.selectHeraCodeList */ SELECT MAJOR_CD ,MINOR_CD ,CD_NM ,USE_YN ,ORDER_SEQ ,REF1 ,REF2 ,REF3 ,REG_ID
,MOD_ID
,(SELECT CD_GRP_NM FROM SET_CD_GRP S1 WHERE S1.MAJOR_CD = T1.MAJOR_CD) AS MAJOR_NM FROM SYS_CODE T1 WHERE MAJOR_CD = #major_cd# AND USE_YN = 'Y'
AND MINOR_CD = #minor_cd#
AND REF1 LIKE CONCAT(#ref1_like#, '%')
ORDER BY ORDER_SEQ

/* common.selectSiteList */ SELECT SITE_ID ,SITE_LOGIN_ID ,SITE_NM ,ACTIVE_YN ,BIZ_NO ,CEO_NM ,BIZ_TP_NM ,BIZ_KIND_NM ,POST_NO ,ADDR1_NM ,ADDR2_NM ,REG_ID
,MOD_ID
FROM STE_SITE WHERE ACTIVE_YN = 'Y'
AND SITE_ID = #site_id#
ORDER BY SITE_NM

/* common.selectDate */ SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS YYYYMMDD ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM') AS YYYYMM ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY') AS Y ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YY') AS YS ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'MONTH') AS M ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'MM') AS MS ,TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'MM'))) AS C ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'MON') AS B ,CASE WHEN SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'MMTH'),1,1) = '0' THEN SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'MMTH'),2) ELSE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'MMTH') END AS D ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'DD') AS DS ,TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'DDD'))) AS J ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'DAY') AS W ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'DAY') AS WS ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'DY') AS A ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH:MI:SS AM') AS R ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24:MI:SS') AS T ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24') AS H ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'MI') AS I ,TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'MI'))) AS K ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'AM') AS P ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'SS') AS S ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS YESTERDAY ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+1,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS TOMORROW ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-7,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS LAST_7_DAY ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-5,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS LAST_5_DAY ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+7,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS AFTER_7_DAY ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+10,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS AFTER_10_DAY ,TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS LAST_MONTH ,TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-3),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS THREE_MONTH_AGO ,TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-12),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS LAST_YEAR
,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, #format1#) AS FORMAT1
,TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-12*#term2#),#format2#) AS FORMAT2
,TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,#term3#),#format3#) AS FORMAT3
,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+(1*(#term4#)),#format4#) AS FORMAT4
,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+(1/24*(#term5#)),#format5#) AS FORMAT5
,TO_DATE(#end_dy#,'YYYYMMDD'))-TO_DATE(#start_dy#,'YYYYMMDD')) AS DATEDIFF
FROM DUAL
